name: Wind Dome
desc:
Exceedingly strong winds kick up around you, forming a dome 15 feet away from you. The winds lightly obscure you, and creatures that attempt to pass through the dome must make a Strength saving throw or be thrown away 10 feet. Ranged attacks aimed through the dome are thrown off course and automatically miss.

The dome dissipates at the start of your next turn.
author: CrusaderDroid
